config.text:
Below are all the config settings of your server.
Use `{{ prefix }}config <key>` to view a single setting
Use `{{ prefix }}config <key> <value>` to set the config <key> to <value>

current.text:
This config is currently set.
Use `{{ prefix }}config {{ key }} <value>` to change it.
Use `{{ prefix }}config {{ key }} default` to reset it to the default.
current.clear: Use `{{ prefix }}config {{ key }} none` to clear it.
current.title: Current Value
current.notSet:
This config is currently **not** set.
Use `{{ prefix }}config {{ key }} <value>` to set it.

config.sameValue: This config is already set to that value.

changed.text:
This config has been changed.
Use `{{ prefix }}config {{ key }} <value>` to change it again.
Use `{{ prefix }}config {{ key }} none` to reset it to the default.

config.title: Your config settings

help.text: This is a list of commands you can use. You can get more info about a specific command by using \`{{ prefix }}help <command>\` (e.g. \`{{ prefix }}help add-ranks\`)

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.entry: **{{ pos }}** {{ change }} **{{ name }}** - **{{ total }}** invites (**{{ regular }}** regular, **{{ custom }}** bonus, **{{ fake }}** fake, **{{ leave }}** leaves)

amount.self: You have **{{ total }}** invites! (**{{ regular }}** regular, **{{ custom }}** bonus, **{{ fake }}** fake, **{{ leave }}** leaves)
amount.other: {{{ target }}} has **{{ total }}** invites! (**{{ regular }}** regular, **{{ custom }}** bonus, **{{ fake }}** fake, **{{ leave }}** leaves)

amount.positive: Added **{{ amount }}** invites for {{{ member }}}, now at: **{{ totalInvites }}** invites.
amount.negative: Removed **{{ amount }}** invites from {{{ member }}}, now at: **{{ totalInvites }}** invites.

fake.none: No fake invites detected so far.

inviteCodes.title: You have the following codes on the server {{ guild }}

recommendedCode.title: Recommended invite code
recommendedCode.none: Please create a permanent invite code.

permanent.title: Permanent

temporary.title: Temporary
temporary.text: These invites expire after a certain time.

inviteCodes.dmSent: I sent you a DM with all your invite codes.
inviteCodes.noCodes: You don't have any active invite codes. Please ask the moderators of the server how to create one.

export.title: InviteManager - Export
export.preparing: Please wait while we prepare the file...

tryPremium.title: InviteManager Premium - Free Trial
tryPremium.currentlyActive: You currently have an active premium subscription!
tryPremium.text: You can try out our premium features for {{ duration }}. You can only do this once. Would you like to test it now?
tryPremium.started: You successfully started your trial! Use `{{ prefix }}premium` to check how much time you have left.

premium.title: InviteManager Premium
premium.text:
This servers subscription is valid for another {{ date }}.

[What can I do with premium?](https://docs.invitemanager.co/bot/premium/extra-features)

noPremium.title: This server currently does not have a premium subscription
noPremium.text: By subscribing to a premium tier you help the development of the bot and also get some additional features.

embeds.title: Premium Feature: Embeds in join messages
embeds.text:
You can use an embed in your join and leave messages which look a lot better.
[See some examples here](https://docs.invitemanager.co/bot/custom-messages/join-message-examples)

export.title: Premium Feature: History export
export.text: You can export all the joins and leaves that happened on your server since you invited our bot.

createInvite.done: Created invite code **{{ code }}** named **{{ name }}** for {{ channel }}.

invites.title: Invites
invites.text: **{{ total }}** (**{{ regular }}** regular, **{{ custom }}** bonus, **{{ fake }}** fake, **{{ leave }}** leaves)

clear.title: Cleared invites
clear.text: **{{ total }}** (**{{ regular }}** regular, **{{ custom }}** bonus, **{{ fake }}** fake, **{{ leave }}** leaves)

joins.title: Joins
joins.unknown: unknown (this only works for new members)

regularInvites.title: Regular invites
regularInvites.none: This member has not invited anyone so far

bonusInvites.entry: **{{ amount }}** from {{{ creator }}} - **{{ date }}**, reason: **{{ reason }}**
bonusInvites.title: Bonus invites

invitedMembers.title: Invited members
invitedMembers.none: This member has not invited anyone else so far

subtractFakes.none: There have been no fake invites so far!

addRank.created: Added rank **{{{ role }}}** which needs {{ invites }} invites and has the following description: {{ description }}

ranks.title: Ranks
ranks.none: No ranks have been created yet.

setup.title: Setting up InviteManager
setup.text: After inviting the bot, all invites will be tracked automatically.

joinLeave.title: Setting join and leave message channel
joinLeave.text: If you want to display join and or leave messages in one of your channels, you have to configure that channel by doing `!config joinMessageChannel #channel` or `!config leaveMessageChannel #channel`. Make sure the bot has write permissions in those channels!

prefix.title: Changing the prefix
prefix.text:
You can change the prefix by doing `!config prefix !`

If you don't know the bots prefix, you can find it using `@InviteManager config prefix`.

faq.title: FAQs and more
faq.text:
Use the `!faq` command for more info, eg. how to change the prefix or customize the join/leave messages.

A complete guide on setting up the bot can be found here: https://github.com/AndreasGassmann/discord-invite-manager/

help.title: Help
help.text: If you need help or have feedback, you can either use the `!feedback` command or join our discord support server: {{ link }}

premium.title: Premium
premium.text:
If you would like to support the development of this bot, you can do so by supporting us on Patreon: {{ link }}

Depending on the tier, you will get some additional features.

manageGuild.title: Missing permission: Manage Server
manageGuild.text: The bot does not have the `Manage Server` permission. This permission is required to read the invites of the user. Without this permission the join messages won't work.

manageRoles.title: Missing permission: Manage Roles
manageRoles.text: The bot does not have the `Manage Roles` permissions. This permission is required to assign roles to a user. Without this permission members cannot be auto-promoted.

viewAuditLogs.title: Missing permission: View Audit Logs
viewAuditLogs.text: The bot does not have the `View Audit Logs` permissions. This permission allows the bot to better track invites.

enum.validValues: Use one of the following values: {{{ values }}}

permissions.premiumOnly: This command is only available for premium subscribers!
